base_description: Rectangular desk with drawers, white and black.
part_description: The desk has a flat rectangular top, three drawers on the right, and a black metal frame. The drawers are vertically aligned beneath the tabletop.
internal_interaction_description: The drawers slide in and out of the frame, providing storage space. The metal frame supports the tabletop and drawers, ensuring stability. The arrangement allows for organized storage and easy access to items within the drawers.
external_interaction_description: The desk provides a surface for writing or placing objects like computers or books. It interacts with the user by offering storage in the drawers and a workspace on the tabletop. Its design allows it to fit in various room settings, accommodating different needs.
